introSection.heading1: I'm deeply passionate about HTML/CSS and modern web technologies.
introSection.heading2: Over the years, I’ve spent a good amount of time working with familiar tools like JavaScript, TypeScript, React—and NodeJS and they have been part of my journey.
introSection.heading3: My field of Interest's are building new
introSection.heading4: I’m especially interested in building modern web applications and innovative digital products.
introSection.heading5: Recently, I’ve been quite interested in Next.js, NestJS, and Tailwind CSS, and I’m currently working on a few personal projects that I plan to complete soon.
